title: TaskFlow - Project Management App
summary: A real-time collaborative project management application with kanban boards, team chat, and automated workflows.

details.overview: TaskFlow is a comprehensive project management solution designed for small to medium teams. It features real-time collaboration, intuitive kanban boards, and powerful automation capabilities.
features: Real-time kanban boards with drag-and-drop functionality
Integration with GitHub, Slack, and Google Calendar
details.techStack: Built with React for the frontend, Node.js/Express for the backend API, MongoDB for data persistence, and Socket.io for real-time features. Styled with TailwindCSS and deployed on AWS.
details.challenges: The biggest challenge was implementing real-time synchronization across multiple clients while maintaining data consistency. I solved this using Socket.io rooms and optimistic UI updates with rollback capabilities.
details.learned: This project deepened my understanding of WebSocket protocols, state management in real-time applications, and the importance of optimistic UI updates for perceived performance.

title: Neural Image Classifier
summary: A deep learning image classification system with a web interface for custom model training and inference.

details.overview: This project provides an accessible interface for training and deploying custom image classification models. Users can upload training data, configure model parameters, and deploy trained models for inference.
features: Transfer learning with pre-trained models (ResNet, VGG, EfficientNet)
Model performance metrics and confusion matrices
details.techStack: The ML pipeline is built with TensorFlow/Keras, served through a Flask API, containerized with Docker, and deployed on AWS EC2 with S3 for model storage.
details.challenges: Handling large datasets efficiently and providing real-time training feedback required implementing background workers with Celery and WebSocket connections for progress updates.
details.learned: Gained extensive experience with ML model deployment, transfer learning techniques, and building production-ready ML systems.

title: CryptoTrack - Portfolio Tracker
summary: A cryptocurrency portfolio tracking application with real-time prices, analytics, and price alerts.

details.overview: CryptoTrack helps users manage and monitor their cryptocurrency investments with real-time data, interactive charts, and customizable alerts.
features: Real-time cryptocurrency prices from multiple exchanges
Price alerts via email and push notifications
details.techStack: Built with Next.js 14 and TypeScript, using PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM for data management. Chart.js for visualizations and various crypto APIs for real-time data.
details.challenges: Rate limiting from multiple APIs and ensuring data consistency across different exchanges required implementing a robust caching layer and data normalization pipeline.
details.learned: Improved my understanding of financial data handling, API rate limiting strategies, and building responsive data dashboards.

title: CodeCollab - Real-time Code Editor
summary: A collaborative code editor supporting real-time editing, video calls, and code execution in multiple languages.

details.overview: CodeCollab enables developers to collaborate on code in real-time with features like pair programming, video calls, and instant code execution.
features: Real-time collaborative editing with cursor presence
Video and audio calls using WebRTC
details.techStack: React frontend with Monaco Editor (VS Code's editor), WebRTC for video/audio, Firebase for real-time sync, and isolated Docker containers for code execution.
details.challenges: Implementing CRDT (Conflict-free Replicated Data Types) for conflict resolution in collaborative editing while maintaining performance was the main technical hurdle.
details.learned: Deep dive into operational transformation, WebRTC protocols, and building secure code execution sandboxes.
